titles.title: Cell-Site Simulator Warrant Act of 2025
Cell-Site Simulator Warrant Act of 2025
To amend title 18, United States Code, to regulate the use of cell-site simulators, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Intelligence (Permanent Select), Armed Services, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
